DOC.brief_summary: This multi-centre , non-randomized open phase I/randomized phase II study conduct 70 patient ( 10 phase I , 60 phase II ) platinum-refractory recurrent epithelial cancer ovary , fallopian tube peritoneum . A total approximately 5 national center participate phase I study . If start criterion phase II study meet end phase I , total approximately 20 national center participate phase II study .
